name: Deathless

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally RESIST in Arena by 70

skills.name: Grave Whispers
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 70% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns if 1 or more allies are dead, a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns if 2 or more allies are dead, and a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff for 2 turns if 3 or more allies are dead.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Vile Insults
skills.raw_description:
Places a 30% [Reflect Damage] buff on this Champion for 2 turns, then attacks 1 enemy. Has an 80% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Grim Revenge
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. This attack will always be critical if there are 2 or more dead allies. Damage increases according to the number of dead allies.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

faction.name: Knight Revenant
faction.default_description: Knight Revenant is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 34 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Knight Revenant is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 22 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Disciples of the K'leth death cult, the Knights Revenant see themselves as vessels of the spirits of the dead of their order. They raid indiscriminately to capture slaves to support themselves and as ritual sacrifices. Upon initiation, devotees surrender their bodies to the spirits of dark warriors.

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Deathless is a epic def champion from the faction Knight Revenant doing spirit damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

structured_data.description: Member of the faction Knight Revenant, Deathless is a champion of Epic rarity and of Def type
structured_data.name: Deathless

default_description: Deathless is a epic def champion from the faction Knight Revenant doing spirit damage
